DOC.brief_summary: This randomize controlled trial compare 3 strategy improve wellness behavior clinical goal diabetes type 2 ( DM2 ) Medicaid patient . A patient interactive cell phone disease management system plus community health worker ( CHW ) superior either cell phone system CHW alone activate DM2 Medicaid patient improve composite 7 Wellness Behaviors 6 Clinical Goals .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize controlled trial compare 3 strategy improve wellness behavior clinical goal DM2 Medicaid patient uncontrolled DM . - Group 1 assist Voxiva Care4Life mobile health disease management program ( C4L ) provide patient 's cell phone . - Group 2 assist CHWs member outpatient medical home health team . - Group 3 assist Voxiva Care4Life mHealth disease management system ( C4L ) CHW . Hypotheses : 1 . A patient interactive cell phone disease management system plus community health worker ( CHW ) superior either cell phone system CHW alone activate DM2 Medicaid patient improve composite 7 Wellness Behaviors 6 Clinical Goals . 2 . A patient interactive cell phone disease management system activate Medicaid patient type 2 diabetes ( DM2 ) improve composite 7 wellness behavior 6 clinical outcome 25 % great compare baseline Expected Outcomes : Primary outcome : 1 . Superior improvement baseline composite Wellness Behaviors Clinical Outcomes CHW plus C4L group compare CHW alone cell phone alone group . 2 . Improvement 25 % great baseline composite Wellness Behaviors Clinical Outcomes patient use C4L alone . Secondary outcome : Improvement clinical behavior endpoint . Endpoints compare across three treatment arm include : 1. mean HbA1c , 2. mean LDLc Cholesterol 3. average BP hypertensive 4 . Patient distress measure Fisher Brief Diabetes Distress Screening Instrument 4 ) Medication adherence measure Morisky Medication Adherence Survey 5 ) Healthcare utilization : ER , acute clinic visit , hospitalization Anticipated result impact healthcare : Mobile health great potential enhance DM2 patient health behavior clinical outcome alone , even well , assistance CHW . mHealth system provide wide range urban rural DM2 patient result affordable , efficient patient-driven/centered health delivery system .
DOC.criteria: Age 21 75 year old Medicaid insurance coverage , Medicare insurance coverage Affordable Health Care Act insurance coverage Fluent English Spanish able read text message Diagnosed diabetes mellitus type 2 A1C > 8 % Acceptable value either : A1c obtain within one month prior baseline ( long diabetes change make month ) A new A1c measure baseline screen visit . Meets < 10 wellness behavior clinical goal diagnose hypertension Meets < 9 wellness behavior clinical goal diagnose hypertension Stage 5 chronic kidney disease end stage renal disease dialysis Terminal illness ( expect survival less one year ) Severe dementia uncontrolled mental illness Gestational diabetes mellitus Use insulin pump Inability use cellular phone Unable use software application cellular phone Pregnant planning get pregnant
DOC.keyword: mobile health cell phone application impact health
